pwe3.description: PWE3 module query root node.It contains pw signal info.

pws.description: PW query info. It contains the pw list info.

pw.description: PW query info. It contains the following attributes: pw-name,peer-address,pw-type,fec-type,service-type,instance-id,instance-name,ldp-session-status,signal-status,signal-mode,standby-flag,local-label,remote-label,local-status,remote-status,interface parameters. PW supports only carrying the name as a query, or not carrying seach criteria.

peer-address.description: The remote peer's IP address of the PW.

pw-type.description: L2VPN PW Type. Assigned values are specified in IANA Allocations for Pseudowire Edge to Edge Emulation (PWE3).

fec-type.description: The fec type of the PW. It contains 128 type and 129 type.

local-taii.description: The local target attachment individual identifier.

remote-taii.description: The remote target attachment individual identifier.

local-saii.description: The local source attachment individual identifier.

remote-saii.description: The remote source attachment individual identifier.

service-type.description: The service type of L2VPN instance which the PW belonged to.

instance-id.description: The instance ID of L2VPN instance which the PW belonged to.

instance-name.description: The instance name of L2VPN instance which the PW belonged to.

ldp-session-status.description:
The state of LDP session,NON,DOWN,UP,GR1 or GR2.

NON : The LDP session is absent.

DOWN: The LDP session is DOWN, not UP(or NON,or GR1,or GR2).

UP  : The LDP session is OPERATIONAL.

GR1 : The LDP session is reconnecting.

GR2 : TheLDP session's remote mappings are recovering.

signal-status.description: The signal status of the PW, UP or DOWN.

signal-mode.description: The negotiated signal mode of the PW, MARTINI,PWE3 or UNKNOWN.

standby-flag.description: The negotiated standby flag of the PW, ACTIVE,STANDBY or UNKNOWN.

local-label.description: The local label of the PW. The value 0 represents the local label absent.

remote-label.description: The remote label of the PW. The value 0 represents the remote label absent.

local-status.description:
The local status of the PW. Contain:ALLOK,PWNF,AR,AT,PSNR,PSNT.
ALLOK - Pseudo Wire Forwarding
PWNF  - Pseudo Wire Not Forwarding
AR    - Local AC (ingress) Receive Fault
AT    - Local AC (egress) Transmit Fault
PSNR  - Local PSN-facing PW (ingress) Receive Fault
PSNT  - Local PSN-facing PW (egress) Transmit Fault

remote-status.description:
The remote status of the PW. Contain:ALLOK,PWNF,AR,AT,PSNR,PSNT.
ALLOK - Pseudo Wire Forwarding
PWNF  - Pseudo Wire Not Forwarding
AR    - Local AC (ingress) Receive Fault
AT    - Local AC (egress) Transmit Fault
PSNR  - Local PSN-facing PW (ingress) Receive Fault
PSNT  - Local PSN-facing PW (egress) Transmit Fault

cword.description: The negotiated cword of the PW.

mtu.description: The negotiaed mtu of the PW.

vccv.description: The negotiated vccv of the PW, it contains CV type and CC type. According to the protocol, CV type contains :LSP,ICMP,BFD_BASIC_HEAD,BFD_STATUS_HEAD,BFD_BASIC_RAW and BFD_STATUS_RAW; CC type contains : ALERT,CW and TTL.

fcs-retention-indicator.description: The negotiated fcs retention indicator of the PW.

pw-emu-type.description: The emulation type of the PW. It could be tdm, fr and atm. There are different interface parameters for different emulation types.

tdm.description: The emulation type of the PW is tdm.

bit-rate.description: The negotiated bit rate of the PW. It is meaningful only when the pw type is the  following value: SDH_CESoM(8),SDH_CEoP(16),SAToP_E1(17),SAToP_T1(18),SAToP_E3(19),SAToP_T3(20),CESoPSN_B(21),TDM_AAL1(22),CESoPSN_C(23),TDM_AAL2(24).

payload-bytes.description: The negotiated payload bytes of the PW. It is meaningful only when the pw type is the  following value: SDH_CESoM(8),SDH_CEoP(16),SAToP_E1(17),SAToP_T1(18),SAToP_E3(19),SAToP_T3(20),CESoPSN_B(21),CESoPSN_C(23).

cells-per-packet.description: The negotiated TDMoIP AAL1 cells per packet of the PW. It is meaningful only when the pw type is TDM_AAL1(22).

tdmoip-aal1-mode.description: The negotiated tdmoip aal1 mode of the PW. It is meaningful only when the pw type is TDM_AAL1(22).

tdmoip-options.description: The TDMoIP AAL2 Options parameter of the PW. It contains vad,encoding,duration. It is meaningful only when the pw type is TDM_AAL2(24).

vad.description: The negotiated vad of TDMoIP AAL2 Options parameter of the PW.

encoding.description: The negotiated encoding of TDMoIP AAL2 Options parameter of the PW.

duration.description: The negotiated duration of TDMoIP AAL2 Options parameter of the PW.

tdm-options.description: The TDM Options parameter of the PW. It contains rtp, timestamp-mode, frequency, ssrc, payload-type, cas and sp. It is meaningful only when the pw type is the following value: SAToP_E1(17),SAToP_T1(18),SAToP_E3(19),SAToP_T3(20),CESoPSN_B(21),TDM_AAL1(22),CESoPSN_C(23),TDM_AAL2(24).

rtp.description: The negotiated rtp header usage.

timestamp-mode.description: The negotiated timestamp mode. It could be absolute mode or differential mode.

frequency.description: The negotiated frequency of timestamping clock.

ssrc.description: The negotiated value of the Synchronization source ID.

payload-type.description:
The negotiated payload type in the RTP header expected by the PW endpoint distributing
this FEC.

cas.description: The negotiated cas of the PW, it is meaningful only when the pw type is CESoPSN_C(23).

sp.description: The negotiated sp of the PW, which encodes support for the CESoPSN signaling packets.

cep-option.description: The CEP Options parameter of the PW. It contains ais, une, rtp, ebm, async-t3, async-e3, cep-type. It is meaningful only when the pw type is the following value: SDH_CESoM(8),SDH_CEoP(16).

une.description: The negotiated une of CEP Options parameter of the PW.

cep-type.description: The negotiated cep type of CEP Options parameter of the PW.

NON : The LDP session is absent.

DOWN: The LDP session is DOWN, not UP(or NON,or GR1,or GR2).

UP  : The LDP session is OPERATIONAL.

GR1 : The LDP session is reconnecting.

GR2 : TheLDP session's remote mappings are recovering.

ldp-session-status.description:
The state of LDP session,NON,DOWN,UP,GR1 or GR2.

NON : The LDP session is absent.

DOWN: The LDP session is DOWN, not UP(or NON,or GR1,or GR2).

UP  : The LDP session is OPERATIONAL.

GR1 : The LDP session is reconnecting.

GR2 : TheLDP session's remote mappings are recovering.

local-status.description:

ALLOK - Pseudo Wire Forwarding
PWNF  - Pseudo Wire Not Forwarding
AR    - Local AC (ingress) Receive Fault
AT    - Local AC (egress) Transmit Fault
PSNR  - Local PSN-facing PW (ingress) Receive Fault
PSNT  - Local PSN-facing PW (egress) Transmit Fault
